item.title: Alternative website usage with URL redirect Chrome extension
item.description: Motivation Some websites have valuable content, but their UIs seem like they’re designed to humiliate you by: Forcing you to use their mobile app (even if the website itself would be enough for you) Force you to log in Doing whatever they want with your data Great examples are Reddit and Instagram. Alternative UI implementations To introduce you to the concept, we take Reddit as an example. Let’s decouple Reddit into different components:
